serverError.unknown: Kuskure da ba a sani ba ta faru
serverError.invalidSession: Zaman ka ya ķare. Da fatan za ka sake shiga.

serverError.handleMismatch: Tantance sunan bai yi nasara ba
serverError.forbidden: Ba ka da izinin yin wannan
serverError.banned: Ba a ba wannan asusu damar amfani da wannan sabis ba
serverError.notParticipant: Ba ka cikin wannan tattaunawa ba
serverError.blockedUser: Ba za ka iya aika saƙo ga wannan mai amfani ba
serverError.selfDm: Ba za ka iya aika saƙo ga kanka ba
serverError.rateLimited: Buƙatu da yawa. Da fatan za ka jira ka sake gwadawa.
serverError.serverError: Wani abu ya lalace a ɓangarenmu
serverError.networkError: Kuskuren cibiyar sadarwa. Duba haɗin ka.
serverError.contentFiltered: An toshe saƙon ta hanyar tace abun ciki
